sentence.Network_en: The adjudicator has to decide impartially between the two parties.
sentence.Network_cn: 判决者必须在双方当事人中做公正的裁决.

sentence.Network_en: No appeals will be accepted. The decision of the Chief Adjudicator shall be final.
sentence.Network_cn: 大会不设上诉,以总裁判的最终判决为准.

entry.def: If you adjudicate on a dispute or problem, you make an official judgment or decision about it.

example.ex: ...a commissioner to adjudicate on legal rights...
The international court of justice might be a suitable place to adjudicate claims.
example.tran: 国际法庭或许是对所有权作出裁决的合适之地。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who studies and settles conflicts and disputes
